Ramhorn/Stinkbomb:

::Ramhorn stops, putting a hand up signaling Stinkbomb::
"The Preds are retreating...some of them are coming this way."
::Ramhorn saw Manterror and Injector come down a hill, opening fire with 
sonic shells, the mantis falling down, sliding down the hill, the same thing 
happenin to Injector::

::Stinkbomb fires off a spray of his chemical at Injector and Manterror::

"Run!" (Injector screams, INjector and Manterror retreating, the spray only 
in close enough to give them an extremely foul stench::
